Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity

Interface Removeable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NodeProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, RectangleEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity, YaegerEntity
    public interface Removeable
extends NodeProvider
    A Removeable denotes an Object, most likely an YaegerEntity, that is eligible for removance from its parent.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void notifyRemove()
      Send a Event to notify all Listeners that this Removeable should be removed.
      void remove()
      Perform all necessary actions to remove the entity.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.NodeProvider

        getGameNode, toBack, toFront

    • Method Detail

      • remove

        void remove()
        Perform all necessary actions to remove the entity.

      • notifyRemove

        default void notifyRemove()
        Send a Event to notify all Listeners that this Removeable should be removed.
